languages.text: "Мы — Вольные Торговцы, и у нас особая судьба. Но мы помним тех, кто шел подле нас, служил нам, кого мы ценили".
"We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."
languages.original_text: "Мы — Вольные Торговцы, и у нас особая судьба. Но мы помним тех, кто шел подле нас, служил нам, кого мы ценили".

traits.locale_text: "We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we loved."
"We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we loved."
"We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we loved."
"We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we loved."
"We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."
"We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."

languages.text: « Nous sommes des libres-marchands, et rares sont ceux qui peuvent prétendre à notre destin. Pourtant, nous nous souvenons de ceux qui ont marché à nos côtés, qui nous ont servis et que nous avons honorés. »
languages.original_text: "We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes des libres-marchands, et rares sont ceux qui peuvent prétendre à notre destin. Pourtant, nous nous souvenons de ceux qui ont marché à nos côtés, qui nous ont servis et que nous avons honorés. »

languages.text: «Somos Comerciantes Independientes, y nuestro destino es único. Sin embargo, recordamos a todos cuantos caminaron a nuestro lado, a cuantos nos sirvieron y a cuantos honramos».
languages.original_text: "We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."

traits.locale_text: «Somos Comerciantes Independientes, y nuestro destino es único. Sin embargo, recordamos a todos cuantos caminaron a nuestro lado, a cuantos nos sirvieron y a cuantos honramos».

languages.text: “我们是行商浪人，我们的旅途世所罕见。但即便如此，我们依然记得那些曾陪伴在我们身边、为我们服务、被我们珍视的人们。”
languages.original_text: "We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."

traits.locale_text: “我们是行商浪人，我们的旅途世所罕见。但即便如此，我们依然记得那些曾陪伴在我们身边、为我们服务、被我们珍视的人们。”

languages.text: 「私たちはローグトレーダーだ。奇妙な運命を持つ。だが、一度でも味方になった者達はずっと覚えている。私たちに仕えたもの、そして私たちが尊んだ者のことを」
languages.original_text: "We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはローグトレーダーだ。奇妙な運命を持つ。だが、一度でも味方になった者達はずっと覚えている。私たちに仕えたもの、そして私たちが尊んだ者のことを」

languages.text: "Wir sind Freihändler mit einem ausgesprochen seltenen Schicksal. Und doch erinnern wir uns an jene, die einst an unserer Seite gewandelt sind, die uns gedient und die wir verehrt haben."
languages.original_text: "We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind Freihändler mit einem ausgesprochen seltenen Schicksal. Und doch erinnern wir uns an jene, die einst an unserer Seite gewandelt sind, die uns gedient und die wir verehrt haben."

languages.text: "Bizler Hür Taciriz. Bizim paylaştığımız, çok özel bir kaderdir. Lakin bir zamanlar yanımızda yürümüş olanları, bize hizmet etmiş olanları, onurlandırılmış olanları asla unutmayız."
languages.original_text: "We are Rogue Traders, and ours is a rare destiny. Yet still we remember those who once walked at our side, who served us, whom we honoured."
